scripts.start: [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ] && npm run serve:server:production || npm run serve:server:dev
scripts.mkdir: npm run mkdir:public && npm run mkdir:assets
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:assets && npm run build:production
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.serve:server:dev: NODE_ENV=development CLIENT_PATH=build/dev/public nodemon --exec babel-node server/index.js --watch server --ignore server/public
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp client/index.html build/dev/public
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar client/index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && cp client/main.css build/dev/public
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar client/main.css -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.build:assets: npm run clean:assets && cp -r client/assets build/dev/public/assets
scripts.build:production: npm run build:assets:production && npm run build:html:production && npm run build:css:production && npm run build:js:production && npm run build:server:production
scripts.build:assets:production: npm run clean:assets:production && cp -r client/assets build/production/public/assets
scripts.build:html:production: npm run clean:html && cp client/index.html build/production/public
scripts.build:css:production: npm run clean:css && cp client/main.css build/production/public
scripts.build:server:production: npm run clean:server:production && npm run mkdir:server:production && NODE_ENV=production babel server -d build/production/server --ignore public
